metadata.title: Berry Trada | Premium Ginger Exporter and Processor
metadata.description: Berry Trada is a leading exporter and processor of premium ginger, offering top-quality fresh ginger, advanced washing services, and comprehensive support for exporters. Ensuring the highest quality ginger from farm to market.

Hero.title: A leading Ginger Exporter and Processor
Hero.description: At Berry Trada, we understand the importance of delivering premium quality ginger globally. Using advanced machinery and collaboration with the <brin>Indonesian National Research and Innovation Agency (BRIN)</brin> on post-harvest practices, leading to the best quality and guaranteed product.

Services.paragraph: Our modern processing techniques ensure that every piece of ginger we handle retains its natural freshness, flavor, and nutritional value. Using advanced washing and packing systems that minimize damage and maximize shelf life, setting a new standard in the industry.
Services.ExportServiceDescription: Berry Trada offers the finest Indonesian ginger for export. We ensure every shipment is fresh and high-quality, making us the go-to choice for importers around the globe.
Services.WashingServiceDescription: Our ginger washing service uses the latest methods to clean your ginger thoroughly. We make sure your ginger is spotless, fresh, and ready for market.
Services.WholesaleServiceDescription: Berry Trada supplies fresh, high-quality ginger to local markets at wholesale prices. We guarantee that our ginger is always fresh and of the best quality, perfect for your needs.
Services.TubersServiceDescription: Our tubers washing service ensures your tubers are clean and ready for sale. We use effective cleaning methods to remove dirt and impurities, keeping the tubers in great condition.
Services.GingerCollectServiceDescription: As a reliable ginger dealer, Berry Trada collects high-quality ginger directly from farmers. We ensure fair prices and support for farmers, bringing the best ginger to the market.
Services.GingerPlantingServiceDescription: Partner with Berry Trada to grow ginger on your land. We provide the know-how and support needed to grow high-quality ginger, ensuring a good harvest and benefits for everyone involved.

About.title: Ketahui detail tentang perusahaan kami
About.description: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. In convallis tortor eros. Donec vitae tortor lacus. Phasellus aliquam ante in maximus.
About.taglineAbout: Professional Ginger Exporter and Washing Service Provider
About.descriptionAbout1: Did you know that 90% of Indonesian ginger shipments to export destinations in mid-2024 experienced spoilage? This is not only due to the young age of the ginger but as well as poor processing methods, which tend to be conventional and lack adequate quality control standards.
About.descriptionAbout2: At Berry Trada, we are dedicated to transforming the ginger industry through innovation and technology. By focusing on sustainable post-harvest technology, we ensure that we deliver fresh, high-quality ginger with a longer shelf life to our clients, no matter where they are.
About.descriptionAbout3: Our business focus is on exporting premium ginger, offering the best washing and packing services, and providing comprehensive support to other exporters.
About.descriptionMission1: At Berry Trada, we are committed to transforming the way ginger is processed and exported. Our mission is to elevate the quality and reliability of Indonesian ginger through the implementation of cutting-edge technologies and advanced post-harvest treatment methods.
About.descriptionMission2: Our modern processing techniques ensure that every piece of ginger we handle retains its natural freshness, flavor, and nutritional value. We utilize state-of-the-art washing and packing systems that minimize damage and maximize shelf life, setting a new standard in the industry.
About.descriptionMission3: By combining essential science with innovative solutions, we not only improve the quality of our own exports but also support other local exporters in enhancing their processes. Our goal is to rebuild the global trust in Indonesian ginger, making it synonymous with premium quality and exceptional standards.
About.taglineVision: Setting the Standard for Global Ginger Excellence
About.descriptionVision: To revolutionize the Indonesian ginger export industry by setting new standards of quality, efficiency, and trust, ensuring our ginger is recognized globally for its superior freshness and reliability.

gallery.title: PORTFOLIO Gallery, Previews and Portfolio
gallery.description: Explore our gallery to see the quality and care that goes into every step of our ginger processing and export.

testimonials.title: TESTIMONIAL What Our Clients Say About Us
testimonials.description: Our commitment to quality and excellence has earned us the trust and satisfaction of our clients. Read what our importers and customers of washing services have to say about their experience with us.
testimonials.review1: Their premium quality ginger is consistently fresh and flavorful. The reliability and excellent service make them our go-to supplier. We trust Berry Trada to deliver the best every time.
testimonials.review2: We have been importing ginger from Berry Trada for over a year now, and their commitment to quality is unmatched. Their use of advanced post-harvest technology ensures that we receive the freshest ginger.
testimonials.review3: Berry Trada's washing services have significantly improved the quality of our ginger. Their basic and premium washing options are thorough and efficient, ensuring our products are market-ready and free from impurities. It's a vital service for our export operations.
